## Objective 
Simulate the BTS survey over the NEUS survey grid and the distributed summer flounder population. 

Output: survey data containing numbers caught per tow/set, and length and age sampled data 


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(raster)
library(SimSurvey)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(data.table)
library(patchwork)
library(here)

# Load the population abundance and distribution 
pop <- readRDS(here("R", "sumflounder", "data", "sumflounder_dist.rds"))

set.seed(8675309)
```


## Simulate Survey
```{r}
surv_dat <- pop |>
  sim_survey(n_sims = 2,
             trawl_dim = c(1.5, 0.014),
             q = sim_logistic(k = 2, x0 = 2.5), #if plot = TRUE, xlim errors
             set_den = 1.463639e-06,
             min_sets = 3,
             resample_cells = TRUE)
```


```{r}
plot_survey(surv_dat, which_year = 1, which_sim = 1)
plot_survey(surv_dat, which_year = 2, which_sim = 1)
plot_survey(surv_dat, which_year = 3, which_sim = 1)
```


```{r}
plot_survey(surv_dat, which_year = 1, which_sim = 2)
plot_survey(surv_dat, which_year = 2, which_sim = 2)
plot_survey(surv_dat, which_year = 3, which_sim = 2)
```
